examples.example: 他勇敢地拿出自己的全部勇气去面对困难。

translate.english: He bravely took out all his courage to face the difficulties.

examples.example: 他总是能在关键时刻拿出最佳状态去迎接挑战。

translate.english: He can always bring out the best state at the critical moment to meet the challenges.

examples.example: 他信心满满地拿出自己的最佳方案来解决这个难题。

translate.english: He confidently took out his best plan to solve this difficult problem.
